body.name: Nostalgia Large-Capacity 0.7-Cu. Ft. Capacity Multi-Functioning Retro Convection Toaster Oven, Fits 12 Slices of Bread and Two 12-Inch Pizzas, Built In Timer, Includes Baking Pan, Metallic Red
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 10 mins
features: LARGE CAPACITY: Large 0.7 cu. ft. capacity allows you to fit up to 12 slices of bread or two 12-inch pizzas and can be used to make casseroles, steaks, cookies or other delicious meals
MULTI-FUNCTIONING TOASTER: Choose between your desired settings - Bake, Toast, Convection Bake and Broil. The indicator light will let you know when unit is on
ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE: Adjustable temperature ranges from 200 to 450°F and features four-stage heating selections - Upper, Lower, Upper and Lower and Off
BUILT-IN TIMER: 60-minute timer will ding when food is done and the Stay-On function allows you to bake longer
CLEAR-VIEW WINDOW: See-through, high temperature resistant glass window with stainless steel handle allows you to see your food while it cooks
EASY CLEAN UP: As if cooking isn't easy enough, the baking pan, wire racks and crumb tray are removable, making cleanup a breeze
body.description: Cooking has never been easier with this stylish 1500-watt countertop oven. This unit is capable of baking, convection baking, toasting and broiling a wide variety of tasty meals, snacks and desserts. With an adjustable cooking temperature of 200° to 450°, This two shelf unit has the versatility to bake two 12-inch pizzas, carefully toast twelve slices of bread, or neatly broil tenderloin steaks. Easily keep track of cooking times by using the built-in 60-minute timer that elicits an audible Ding when done. Two nickel-plated racks, an aluminum baking pan, and crumb tray are included.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nostalgia Retro 12-Cup Coffee Maker Nostalgia Retro Wide 2-Slice Toaster Nostalgia Retro Countertop Microwave Oven Nostalgia Retro Convection Toaster Oven Nostalgia Retro Electric Water Kettle Nostalgia Retro Breakfast Station Function Start your morning out right with a freshly brewed pot of coffee! Featuring automatic shut off and pause-and-serve to pour a cup mid-brewing cycle Equipped with two large toasting slots to accommodate a variety of breads and 5 browning levels Sure to stand out in any kitchen, this microwave features 12 pre-programmed setting and 800 watts of power Great for baking, convection baking, toasting and broiling a wide variety of tasty meals, snacks and desserts Powerful, 1500-watt kettle rapidly boils up to 1.7 liters of water in just minutes 3-In-1: This versatile breakfast station covers your entire morning breakfast, allowing you to make your Coffee, toast and eggs all at once Capacity 12 Cup 2 Slice 0.9 Cu Ft 0.7 Cu Ft 1.7 L 3-in-1 Available Colors Aqua, Red, Black, Pink, Yellow, Cream Aqua, Red, Black, Pink, Yellow Aqua, Red, Black, Pink, Yellow Aqua, Red Aqua, Red, Pink Aqua, Red, White, Pink, Yellow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband purchased this. I was so mad because we had one. I have it a whirl. Now I use it daily. More than my oven. The air fryer is the best I’ve used on a toaster oven. It cleans up easily and cools quickly after use. The color looks great in our vintage looking kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love the color red. I use it everyday instead of putting the oven on. Large capacity.Comes with a basket for French fries or bread.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Toaster oven, works great and is easy to clean.
reviews.reviewText: This toaster oven is easy to use. I have only baked in it. It does a fantastic job. A lot faster than my Maytag electric stove. It only takes a few minutes to preheat and it can bake two 12" frozen pizza with added toppings just fine with room to spare between them. Its actually really pretty also. Jut like in the ad picture. The price was awesome. I got lucky and found it with a $30.00 off coupon. Made it $65.00. I'm going to try baking a whole chicken this afternoon on convection. I was looking for a Cuisinart, But I found this and for the price, I got a bargain and I love it. Plus it very easy to clean. It also comes with 2 racks and a cookie sheet. The mini cookie sheets are expensive just by themselves. This was a real bargain.. Plus its really awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phenomenal Retro Appliances!! Completes my home Diner !!!!
reviews.reviewText: Well made and works great . Classic vintage look!! Love it !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I'd wish they'd fix the stop
reviews.reviewText: My second one of these. Not because the first one broke, but because it still works. Only problem is the pull-out shelf. It doesn't have a stop to prevent you from dumping everything on the floor. That picture with the shelf pulled all the way out? Not happening. I complained about this the first time, that's why this time 4-stars. Otherwise, the outside has taken a beating and still looks great. The convection fan still works, and the heating coils still get hot. This is after two teenagers not known for their cleaning ability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It gets hot...
reviews.reviewText: When the microwave gave out, we decided to buy an Instant Pot to help change our eating habits. It wasn't long after that was decided we need something besides the stove, typical apartment oven and instant pot.Hello, Toaster Oven!This has worked quite well for us. The red is beautiful. It matches every red item I have asked my father for for Christmas (He doesn't realize over the years he has slowly been perfecting my Kitchen decor and items with these Christmas requests! ...but I digress).We needed something that worked like a microwave but...just wasn't. I don't have alot of counter space, so the fact I can make hot pockets, toast, pizza, cakes, etc all in one machine? I'm stoked! ....okay, yesy oven can do this but that takes more power and heats the kitchen way more in summer.Now, this little baby gets HOT. ...do NOT put anything on top while cooking... The Verve Buds charge box got heat warped... It melted a tea light......but! If you have those rolls that you have to let rise for a bit before cooking? Ermagod.... Perfect spot to put those babies. Put them on top and Pop the kids dino nuggets in and your golden...they rise a bit faster!We are a family of 5... ....the boys out number me... They eat alot.... 6 months of having it...I need the matching peices now....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE this thing!
reviews.reviewText: Wow. This is a great little convection toaster oven. Well...it's actually pretty big for a toaster oven. It is a perfect size for rolls, cornbread and cassaroles. I don't have a regular convection oven so this actually works better than my big electric oven. Less heat generated and less electricity used if I bake with this. Which is very nice in hot weather. If you want to bake actual standard size loaves of bread (2 will fit) remember to cover the tops with foil or they will burn because they're so close to the element. I kinda feel like a kid using my little easy bake oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast works great
reviews.reviewText: It toasts toast fast and makes pizza's really fast love it

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy caro para que llegara dañado!
reviews.reviewText: Muy caro para que llegara golpeado! Por que es obvio que así lo enpacaron! No pudo golpearse en el viaje! Y muchas trabas para la devolución, prácticamente te obligan a quedarte con el producto dañado

1st Order got lost in shipping but 2nd order came right on time. The description for the depth front to back is a little confusing. It's actually 12 in deep, 10.5 in high by 18.5 in wide. The vents are located on the sides so its good idea to have a few inches of space for it to breathe on both sides. Have only used it once so far but everything works great as advertised. Takes about 15 min to warm it up before you can start cooking. Looks great with our other red small appliances in kitchen.

I love it! I needed a red one to match the coffee maker and toaster, so I did not have too many choices.I like this one for the size, easy to use, features (as per description) and looks. It is red, and I like the retro style!Maybe a little expensive, but again, only 2 choices in 2 sizes for red color.
This looks great and works great.
Love it. Heats up fast compared to a full oven. Nice look, easy to clean. Would recommend strongly. I bought 2 of them.
